verbs.description: [ARG0: President Trump] [V: told] [ARG2: James Comey , the former FBI director] [ARG1: that he never even spent the night in Russia during that trip] .
President Trump told James Comey , the former FBI director that [ARG0: he] [ARGM-NEG: never] [ARGM-ADV: even] [V: spent] [ARG1: the night] [ARGM-LOC: in Russia] [ARGM-TMP: during that trip] .
